name: The Unlit Sun
summary: The Unlit Sun is a psychological horror game played from a first-person perspective, delving into the boundaries between consciousness and the unknown. Trapped in a distorted world shaped by a mysterious entity named Nyctarion, Ethan struggles to escape a dark reality forged by buried secrets and enigmatic symbolism. In an atmosphere filled with tension and looming danger, every decision draws the protagonist closer to—or further from—his fate. Uncover a deep and unsettling story where light and darkness are two sides of the same power.
